name: Maria J.
text: I love it! I make smoothies on a daily basis so this was a must-have. Easy to clean and cuts frozen fruit fast ✨❤️

name: Sierra M.
text: This blender is perfect for smoothies on the go! Convenient and fits in my bag easily!

name: Valerie P.
text: I absolutely love this blender! Strawberry smoothie came out perfect. Great consistency every time.

name: Hannah T.
text: I start work at 6am so I don't always have time to make breakfast. This was ideal to make my meal replacement shakes.

name: Brandon C.
text: It's compact and really powerful! I made a protein shake with it and it was damn good! The self-cleaning feature is a bonus.

name: Jenna H.
text: I love my portable blender and it makes my smoothies so yummy 😋

name: Tanisha G.
text: Being on the road can lead to some unhealthy eating habits, but my Fresh Juice blender helps me get my daily amount of veggies and protein! I use it practically every day to make refreshing ginger-apple-kale smoothies and peanut butter-banana protein shakes. It’s powerful and easy-to-clean, and has been a game changer for road trips and camp outs.

name: Michael R.
text: This blender is fabulous! I use it for my banana shakes and they come out great every time! 🙌🏼

name: Camila B.
text: The smoothies I make in this blender come out so tasty!! And I love that I can take it with me anywhere ❤️

name: Jessica N.
text: I saw this going viral on Instagram and knew I had to get one! I’ve been on a weightloss journey for the past 2 months and use mine to make fruit smoothies. I’ve lost 12 pounds so far and this blender was a big reason for it. Being able to make my smoothies anywhere was a really big help!😍
